title: Bioethics
description: This course examines important bioethical issues in research, policy, medicine, and the environment in light of ethical theory and the process of scientific inquiry.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (BIOS 1107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1107L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or (BIOS 1207 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1207L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or BIOL 1510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 1511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
